trans-unit.source: The SyncFromAllServersOperationException exception is thrown when the request to synchronize from all servers fails.
trans-unit.target: SyncFromAllServersOperationException 异常从所有服务器同步的请求失败时引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> class, using the specified serialization information and streaming context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref>类，使用指定的序列化信息和流上下文。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> class with a specified error message and an underlying exception object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和基础异常对象的类。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
An <xref:System.Exception> object that contains underlying exception information.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref> class with a specified error message, an underlying exception object, and a specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersErrorInformation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息、 基础异常对象和指定的类<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersErrorInformation"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
An <xref:System.Exception> object that contains underlying exception information.
An array of one or more <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersErrorInformation"></xref> objects that describe the errors.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个数组<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersErrorInformation"></xref>描述错误的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersErrorInformation"></xref> objects that describe the errors.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个数组<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersErrorInformation"></xref>描述错误的对象。

trans-unit.source: An array of one or more <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersErrorInformation"></xref> objects that describe the errors.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个数组<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersErrorInformation"></xref>描述错误的对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>包含有关异常的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>对象，其中包含有关序列化对象数据所引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>包含有关源或目标的上下文信息的对象。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
